item.title: How do I change starting look?
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Search for this in Player.Java;

unique

You should see something like this;

//Giving the player an unique look playerEquipment[playerHat]=3385; playerEquipment[playerCape]=1052; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=1712; playerEquipment[playerChest]=3387; playerEquipment[playerShield]=2890; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=3389; playerEquipment[playerHands]=3391; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=3393; playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4675;

Change the numbers’ after the = to whatever item ID you wan’t. If you wan’t the player to have nothing on that part of the body then put in a ‘-1’.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change starting look?
